name: The Good Folk(lore)
description:
When going into medicine I expected boo boos. Bandages. The occasional baby perhaps. I didn’t expect to have to stitch up the SAME zombie the fifth day in a row, or to be supplying a vampire with iron supplements, or soothing a banshee’s sore throat with herbal tea. And you know what? I wouldn’t have it any other way.

A game created during the Global Game Jam 2022. The submission page can be found here:
https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/good-folklore-0
